explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a black jacket and red hat sits on a small, orange, battery-powered mining car. The headlamp on his hat illuminates the path ahead. In the background are several houses and green trees.

[0-3] The man is maneuvering the mining car along a set of narrow tracks, approaching a coal loading area. The mining car is old and well-used, with visible rust and chipped paint. The surrounding environment indicates this is a coal mine.

[0-3] The man is maneuvering the mining car along a set of narrow tracks, approaching a coal loading area. The mining car is old and well-used, with visible rust and chipped paint. The surrounding environment indicates this is a coal mine.

[0-3] The man is maneuvering the mining car along a set of narrow tracks, approaching a coal loading area. The mining car is old and well-used, with visible rust and chipped paint. The surrounding environment indicates this is a coal mine.

[3-13] As the video proceeds, the mining car comes to a gentle stop near another piece of mining equipment. The man, wearing green gloves, leans over from the mining car on the left and expertly maneuvers a chain, securing it to the other piece of equipment. After securing the chain, he is hooking a pair of coal carts to the battery-powered mining locomotive. The coal carts are laden with large pieces of anthracite coal and are pulled along the tracks. Other people can be seen in the background. As the battery-powered locomotive begins to pull the coal carts forward, the camera follows them as they move along.
